# Yen Wee Lim

> AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Currently Lead AI Solutions at Infomina AI Sdn. Bhd.

Yen Wee Lim builds production AI systems, full-stack applications, and data platforms. His work spans agentic AI workflows with LangGraph, enterprise document intelligence, ML pipelines, and serverless infrastructure on AWS. He holds a background in actuarial science and transitioned into AI engineering through data warehousing and credit risk modelling.

## Pages

- [Homepage](https://weeai.dev): Main portfolio with services offered, work experience, education, certifications, and testimonials
- [Projects](https://weeai.dev/projects): Showcase of AI/ML, data engineering, and web application projects
- [Blog](https://weeai.dev/blogs): Technical writing on AI agents, data engineering, infrastructure, and career

## Projects

- [AiMod Platform](https://weeai.dev/projects/aimod-platform): Agentic AI DataOps and MLOps platform with 15+ LangGraph agents for automated data workflows
- [Document AI](https://weeai.dev/projects/doc-auto): Enterprise dual-mode document intelligence system with agentic RAG for structured and unstructured extraction
- [Sentinel Guardrails](https://weeai.dev/projects/sentinel-guardrails): 5-layer AI safety middleware for production LLM systems
- [Credit Risk ML](https://weeai.dev/projects/credit-risk-ml): ML models and 6TB data warehouse built at Credit Bureau Malaysia
- [E-Invoice System](https://weeai.dev/projects/einvoice-system): Serverless billing and e-invoicing system running on approximately RM50/month AWS infrastructure
- [SMTP Relay](https://weeai.dev/projects/smtp-relay-infrastructure): Ansible-automated email relay infrastructure
- [Event Ticketing](https://weeai.dev/projects/event-ticketing-platform): Full-stack ticketing platform with payment processing integration
- [Shopee Bot](https://weeai.dev/projects/shopee-telegram-bot): E-commerce price monitoring bot using CDP and Telegram

## Blog Posts

- [How a 32B Model Beat Gemini 3 Pro at Document Extraction](https://weeai.dev/blogs/model-is-not-the-bottleneck): Why the model is not the bottleneck in production AI systems
- [Locked Out of a Server on Chinese New Year](https://weeai.dev/blogs/locked-out-server-chinese-new-year-ansible): Server lockout incident that led to adopting Ansible automation
- [RAG Is Not Enough](https://weeai.dev/blogs/rag-is-not-enough-dual-mode-document-intelligence): Why basic RAG fails for enterprise documents and the dual-mode approach
- [5-Layer AI Guardrails System](https://weeai.dev/blogs/5-layer-ai-guardrails-system): Architecture behind the Sentinel AI safety middleware
- [From Actuarial Science to AI](https://weeai.dev/blogs/actuarial-science-to-ai): Career journey from actuarial science to AI engineering
- [Building 15 AI Agents for Production](https://weeai.dev/blogs/building-15-ai-agents-production): How 15 LangGraph agents were built and deployed in production
- [Building a 6TB Data Warehouse](https://weeai.dev/blogs/building-6tb-data-warehouse): Designing and operating a 6TB PostgreSQL data warehouse

## Services

- **AI Agents & LLM Systems**: Agentic workflows, RAG pipelines, guardrails, and LLM integration
- **Full-Stack Applications**: Web applications with modern frameworks and cloud deployment
- **Data & MLOps Platforms**: Data warehouses, ML pipelines, and automated DataOps
- **Dashboards & Analytics**: Business intelligence dashboards and data visualization
